Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rename GDPR to Data Subject Request \(DSR\) and add PII registry

Major changes:
- Rename all GDPR terminology to framework-agnostic DSR naming
  - GDPRRequest -> DataSubjectRequest
  - GDPRRequestType -> DSRType
  - useGDPRRequests -> useDataSubjectRequests
  - /gdpr-requests -> /data-subject-requests \(with backwards compat\)
- Add backwards compatibility aliases for all renamed types
- Add ''consent'' as a new DSR request type

New features:
- PII Location Registry for tracking where personal data is stored
- Action Tasks for executing DSR actions against each location
- Support for automated, semi-automated, and manual action types
- Public request submission endpoint with email verification
- Consent tracking fields on PII locations

New files:
- src/types/pii-location.ts, action-task.ts, action-config.ts
- src/repositories/pii-location-repository.ts, action-task-repository.ts
- src/api/handlers/pii-locations.ts, action-tasks.ts, public-requests.ts
- src/hooks/usePIILocations.ts, useActionTasks.ts
- examples/nextjs-app/ - Complete working example application
- migrations/005_pii_locations_action_tasks.sql

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
